honors_and_awards.title: Summer Case Study Challenge 2020
honors_and_awards.description: Won the Summer case study challenge with my teammate, Subhash Gowani. We did analysis for a low cost airline and made strategy for resuming air travel post the ease in lockdown. We built effective travel and marketing strategy for them. Along with this, we also suggested ways to regain consumer confidence on travel and travel safety.
